coded_answer.p: WithIn replayreply onto your letter, I would like to say that I was really pleased with the first prize. It was thea real surprise for me.
I would like to travel justonly in July, because I am going to study at my university untilluntil the end of June. I hope it will not be any problem for you.
I am glad that all accommodation and travel costs have been paid. I would prefer to livestay in thea tent cabin, I think it is more comfortable.

I see people who run the camp are very good inat organizeorganizing athe social life of their guests. I have a lot of posibilitiespossibilities for spending my spare time. The climbing and the painting are preferred by me the most. Generally I paint some landscapes by using the watercolours, but sometimes I try to paint like during the impresionistimpressionist era by using blobs, oil paint and canvases.
At the endFinally I would like to ask what kind of clothes I have to take with me and how much money I will need for the normal life at the camp.
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Report on making aan interesting video film
The aim of this report is to suggest which lessons and other activities should be placeshown atin the video film about daily life at our school.
In order to preperprepare it I visited some clasroomsclassrooms during the lessons and I interviewed a number of students from our school.

Some of the teachers are very good just profesionalistsprofessionals. Their lessons are valuable, rich in knowledge and funyfunny. For example, the teacher of history and polishPolish language is able to interest students aboutin the subject in differentsdifferent ways.

According to students' oppinionsopinions, the most popular activities are the basketball, tennis, swimming and as wellalso the photography group and the painting team. It is surprising that 45 per cent of the students questioned frequent one of thisthese sport'ssports groupgroups and 30 per cent of people go to the photography group.

On the whole our school havehas a lot of different possibilities for the students whatthat we can show onin our film. It cancould maksmake the video more interesting. I recommend to showshowing our teacher of historyhistory teacher. It canwill show that during every day we have a biggreat fun and we recivedreceivedreceive a good, important knowledge.
If we take under an attention thisthese things our film is going to be very interesting
